00033 #include <loos_defs.hpp>
00034 #include <AtomicGroup.hpp>
00035 
00036 namespace loos {
00037 
00039   class Gromacs : public AtomicGroup {
00040   public:
00041 
00042     Gromacs() { }
00043     
00044     explicit Gromacs(const char* fname) {
00045       std::ifstream ifs(fname);
00046       if (!ifs)
00047         throw(std::runtime_error("Cannot open Gromacs file " + std::string(fname)));
00048       read(ifs);
00049     }
00050 
00051     explicit Gromacs(const std::string& fname) {
00052       std::ifstream ifs(fname.c_str());
00053       if (!ifs)
00054         throw(std::runtime_error("Cannot open Gromacs file " + fname));
00055       read(ifs);
00056     }
00057 
00058     explicit Gromacs(std::istream& ifs) { read(ifs); }
00059 
00060 
00061     std::string title(void) const { return(title_); }
00062 
00063   private:
00064     std::string title_;
00065 
00066   private:
00067     
00068     void read(std::istream& ifs);
00069 
00070   };
